page.title: 07SURVEY OF HOUSING - 1
page.content: {Survey of houses & occupiers in area {------------------------------------ {'OLD AUST ROAD'}17 houses,most people are old and have no children,smallish gardens. {'BISHOPS WOOD'}7 houses,mostly middle aged couples, small gardens. {'QUANES'}7 houses,mostly middle aged couples, big gardens. {'COURT VIEW CLOSE'}10 houses (17 years old), middle aged people,big gardens. {'GLEBE FIELD'}Very expensive, small gardens, new. {'COPE PARK'}72 houses (14 years old),large gardens. {'LOWER COURT ROAD'}29 houses,a mixture of houses. {'OVER LANE'}26 houses built between 1909 and 1963. {'CHESTERMASTER CLOSE'}12 houses (13 years old), back and front gardens. (1 of 2) cont'd
